    Grouped Data Functions Micro Data Functions

    Calculate poverty severity using microdata

    pipmd_pov_severity_nv.Rd

    Non-vectorized poverty severity microdata function. Use the vectorized function pipmd_pov_severity

    Usage

    pipmd_pov_severity_nv(
  pipster_object = NULL,
  welfare = NULL,
  weight = rep(1, length = length(welfare)),
  povline = fmean(welfare, w = weight) * times_mean,
  times_mean = 1
)

    Arguments

    pipster_object

    pipster object created using create_pipster_object

    welfare

    numeric: A vector of income or consumption values

    weight

    numeric: A vector of population weights. If NULL, a vector of 1s is used to give equal weight to each observation.

    povline

    numeric: Poverty line in international dollars, same units as welfare.

    times_mean

    numeric factor that multiplies the mean to create a relative poverty line. Default is 1

    Value

    numeric: Poverty severity

    On this page
